title: kandan vindai enna
sahitya:
kandan vindai enna solvEn nAn A aruL migu


anupallavi

  mAdhavan marugan azhagan murugan cindu pADum siddar manam kavar


caraNam    malaitOrum isaindurai mAran porppAdan talai vaNangiDum anbarkkirangum mei nAthan
nilai tavarAdarum INDiDum guruparan vElavan pazhanenamudir umai magizh magan
